name: Bitlandia
description: Bitlandia is a retro-style 16-bit platformer with lots of inspiration taken from games from the 80s-90s. Run through 9 different unique levels with different obstacles and enemies. Help Brad use his trusty blaster to shoot and defeat all the enemies in his path and get to Blood's castle to defeat him and take back Bitlandia! There are lots of collectables hidden in this world. Can you collect them all? If you do, there may be a secret at the end...
